brahma#n pravaqrgyE#Naq praca#riShyAmaH | hOta#r GaqrmamaqBiShTu#hi | agnIqdrauhi#Nau purOqDASAqvadhi#Sraya | prati#prasthAtaqrviha#ra | prastO#taqH sAmA#ni gAya || yaju#ryuktaq(gm)q sAma#BiqrAkta#KantvA | viSvai$r dEqvairanu#matam maqrudBi#H | dakShi#NABiqH prata#tam pArayiqShNum | stuBO# vahantu sumanaqsyamA#nam | sa nOq ruca#ndhEqhyahRu#NIyamAnaH ( ) | BUrBuvaqssuva#H | Omindra#vantaqH praca#rata || 11 (12)

brahmaqn praca#riShyAmaH | hOta#r GaqrmamaqBiShTu#hi || yaqmAya# tvA maqKAya# tvA | sUrya#syaq hara#sE tvA || prAqNAyaq svAhA$ vyAqnAyaq svAhA# &pAqnAyaq svAhA$ | cakShu#ShEq svAhAq SrOtrA#yaq svAhA$ | mana#sEq svAhA# vAqcE sara#svatyaiq svAhA$ | dakShA#yaq svAhAq krata#vEq svAhA$ | Oja#sEq svAhAq balA#yaq svAhA$ || dEqvastvA# saviqtA maddhvA#&naktu | 12 (10)

pRuqthiqvIM tapa#sastrAyasva | aqrcira#si SOqcira#siq jyOti#rasiq tapO#&si | sa(gm)sI#dasva maqhA(gm) a#si | SOca#sva dEvaqvIta#maH | vi dhUqmama#gnE aruqSham mi#yEddhya | sRuqja pra#Sasta dar.Saqtam || aq~jjantiq yam praqthaya#ntOq na viprA$H | vaqpAva#ntaqnnAgninAq tapa#ntaH | piqturna puqtra upa#siq prEShTha#H | A GaqrmO aqgnimRuqtaya#nnasAdIt || 13 (10)

daSaq prAcIqrdaSa# BAsi dakShiqNA | daSa# praqtIcIqrdaSa# BAqsyudI#cIH | daSOqrddhvA BA#si sumanaqsyamA#naH | sa nOq ruca#ndhEqhyahRu#NIyamAnaH || aqgniShTvAq vasu#BiH puqrastA$d-rOcayatu gAyaqtrENaq Canda#sA | sa mA# ruciqtO rO#caya || indra#stvA ruqdrair-da#kShiNaqtO rO#cayatuq traiShTu#BEnaq Canda#sA | sa mA# ruciqtO rO#caya | varu#NastvA&&diqtyaiH paqScAd-rO#cayatuq jAga#tEnaq Canda#sA | sa mA# ruciqtO rO#caya | 19 (10)
